thread.title: Gold for Sundial Venues once again
thread.title_full: Gold for Sundial Venues once again

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: Gold for Sundial Venues once again
text:
Gold for Sundial Venues once again Gold for Sundial Venues once again Details Category: Awards   11:15 Sundial Group's three meeting venues, Highgate House in Northamptonshire, Woodside in Warwickshire and Barnett Hill in Surrey, have all received ‘VenueVerdict's Gold Standard Accreditation' for Q2 by BDRC Continental, the UK's largest independent research consultancy. 
The accreditation, based on customer feedback results from July 2014 to June 2015, is testament to the venues' ongoing dedication to providing exceptional customer service. BDRC Continental obtained feedback from around 360 participating meeting venues and hotels in the UK and Ireland. Highgate House, Woodside and Barnett Hill are amongst 32 venues that have achieved the Gold Standard accreditation. Sundial Group's Managing Director, Tim Chudley, said: “Retaining 100% Gold Standard across our venues is wonderful recognition of the focus that Sundial people give to providing the perfect environment for our clients and their meetings. This feedback and benchmarking lies at the heart of our service excellence strategy.” Related articles
